title: S5 Ep37: Yellow vests and carbon taxes
itunes:title: Yellow vests and carbon taxes
description: Opposition to a carbon tax was at the root of the gilets jaunes protests in France. Did the protestors think the tax wouldn’t work, or that it wasn’t fair, or that they would personally lose out? Adrien Fabre talks to Tim Phillips about the link between tax and trust in government.
itunes:author: VoxTalks
dc:creator: VoxTalks
